SELECT SR.UUID, SR.USER_ID, SR.RECIPE_TITLE, SR.COUNTRY_CATEGORY_ID, SR.INGREDIENT_CATEGORY_ID, SR.SITUATION_CATEGORY_ID, SR.STANDARD_RECIPE_IMAGE_URL, SR.RECIPE_CREATED_AT, SR.LIKE_COUNT, SR.RECIPE_CONTENT, SR.STANDARD_RECIPE_IMAGE, SR.INGREDIENT AS ingredient, SR.RECIPEINTRO AS recipeIntro, U.NICKNAME FROM STANDARD_RECIPES SR JOIN USERS U ON SR.USER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE SR.UUID = #{uuid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STANDARD_RECIPES ( UUID, USER_ID, RECIPE_TITLE, COUNTRY_CATEGORY_ID, INGREDIENT_CATEGORY_ID, SITUATION_CATEGORY_ID, STANDARD_RECIPE_IMAGE, RECIPE_CREATED_AT, LIKE_COUNT, RECIPE_CONTENT, INGREDIENT, RECIPEINTRO ) VALUES ( SQ_STANDARD_RECIPES.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{recipeTitle}, #{countryCategoryId}, #{ingredientCategoryId}, #{situationCategoryId}, #{standardRecipeImage}, SYSDATE, #{likeCount}, #{recipeContent}, #{ingredient}, #{recipeIntro} )
mapper.update: UPDATE STANDARD_RECIPES SET RECIPE_TITLE = #{recipeTitle}, RECIPE_CONTENT = #{recipeContent}, INGREDIENT_CATEGORY_ID = #{ingredientCategoryId}, COUNTRY_CATEGORY_ID = #{countryCategoryId}, SITUATION_CATEGORY_ID = #{situationCategoryId}, STANDARD_RECIPE_IMAGE = #{standardRecipeImage}, RECIPE_CREATED_AT = SYSDATE, LIKE_COUNT = #{likeCount}, INGREDIENT = #{ingredient}, RECIPEINTRO = #{recipeIntro} WHERE UUID = #{uuid}
